mapper.select: select VOL_ID ,MEET_NAME ,MEET_TYPE ,CAP ,MEET_PURP ,MEET_DESC ,REGION ,ROOM_STAT ,REC_PERIOD ,END_PERIOD ,MEM_ID ,ONE_LINER ,(select file_path from files where code='p09' and code_no=volunteer.vol_id) path ,category from volunteer where VOL_ID = #{volId}

SELECT * from( SELECT ROWNUM RN ,A.* from( select VOL_ACT_ID ,VOL_ID ,CATEGORY ,TITLE ,CONTENT ,LOCATION ,CAP ,VOL_DATE ,START_DATE ,EXPIRE_DATE from vol_act where vol_id = #{volId} order by vol_date) A) where RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
select VOLACT_SEQ.NEXTVAL from dual
select VOL_ACT_ID ,VOL_ID ,CATEGORY ,TITLE ,CONTENT ,LOCATION ,CAP ,VOL_DATE ,START_DATE ,EXPIRE_DATE from VOL_ACT where VOL_ACT_ID=#{volActId}

SELECT * from( SELECT ROWNUM RN ,A.* from( select REVIEW_ID ,VOL_ID ,VOL_ACT_ID ,TITLE ,CONTENT ,writer ,WRITE_DATE from vol_review where vol_id = #{volId} order by vol_act_id) A) where RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
select REVIEW_SEQ.NEXTVAL from dual
select REVIEW_ID ,VOL_ID ,VOL_ACT_ID ,TITLE ,CONTENT ,WRITER ,WRITE_DATE from vol_review where REVIEW_ID=#{reviewId}

SELECT * from( SELECT ROWNUM RN ,A.* from( select BOARD_NO ,VOL_ID ,TITLE ,WRITER ,WRITE_DATE ,CONTENT ,VIEW_CNT from free_board where VOL_ID = #{volId} order by BOARD_NO) A) where RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
select count(*) from free_board where VOL_ID = #{volId} order by BOARD_NO
select FREEBOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL from dual
select BOARD_NO ,VOL_ID ,TITLE ,WRITER ,WRITE_DATE ,CONTENT ,VIEW_CNT from free_board where VOL_ID = #{volId} and BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}

select VOL_MEM_ID ,VOL_ID ,APP_DATE ,APP_REASON ,MEM_ID ,(select file_path from files where code='p01' and code_user=vol_mem.mem_id) path from vol_mem where app_code='h02' and vol_id = #{volId} order by app_date
select VOL_ACT_ID ,VOL_ID ,CATEGORY ,TITLE ,CONTENT ,LOCATION ,VOL_DATE from VOL_ACT where VOL_ID=#{volId} and VOL_ACT_ID=#{volActId}

select m.mem_id ,count(m.mem_id) cnt ,(select file_path from files where code='p01' and code_user=m.mem_id) path from vol_Act_mem m join vol_act a on m.VOL_ACT_ID=a.VOL_ACT_ID where a.vol_id = #{volId} group by m.mem_id order by cnt desc
